#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    string s,a;
    int t,al,sl;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>s>>a;
        sl=s.length();
        al=a.length();
        if(al!=sl-1)
        {
            printf("0\n");
            continue;
        }
        else
        {
            int i=0,j=0;
            while(i<sl&&j<al)
            {
                if(s[i]==a[j])
                {
                    i++;j++;
                }
                else
                i++;
            }
            //cout<<i<<j<<" ";
            if(i==j+1||(i==j&&j==al))
            printf("1\n");
            else
            printf("0\n");
        }
    }
}
